name: Combo (QuinnCG)
description:
Made in 3 days as part of the Mini Jam 125: Signal game jam.

The theme (signal) was optional. The required limitation was "Everything is tied to the rhythm". Enemies will spawn during certain moments of the music and the player must keep juggling and dashing toward enemies to build a big enough damage multiplier to kill them.

How to play:

  • Hold AD to move
  • Hold WS to look up or down
  • Hold space to jump
  • Left alt to dash
  • Left mouse to attack
  • ESC to close the game

Successful hits will build a temporary damage multiplier. This multiplier will rapidly deplete if you don't attack anything for a few seconds.

You will attack in the direction you are looking. Hold WASD to make your character look where you want to attack. They can only attack in 4 directions.

If you attack an enemy while looking down you will bounce (pogo) off them.

Your goal is to survive as long as you can and kill as many enemies as you can.

Credits:

Made using Unity.

SFX made using Bfxr 8-bit sound generator.

Art and music made by me.
